title: Week Review: Tanru Mastery
goal: Demonstrate mastery of tanru formation and interpretation.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Quick recall — all 10 new gismu:

blue → ?      long → ?
red → ?       short → ?
yellow → ?    wide → ?
green → ?     deep → ?
black → ?
white → ?

(Answers: blanu, clani, xunre, tordu, pelxu, ganra, crino, condi, xekri, blabi)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

What You Learned This Week

1. Tanru Basics

  • Left word modifies right word
  • blanu gerku = blue dog

2. Place Structure Rule

  • Places come from the RIGHTMOST word
  • sutra klama has klama's 5 places

3. Tanru Ambiguity

  • Meanings are loose and contextual
  • gerku zdani could mean doghouse, dog-like house, etc.

4. Week 10 Gismu (10)

Lojban English Lojban English
blanu blue clani long
xunre red tordu short
pelxu yellow ganra wide
crino green condi deep
xekri black
blabi white

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (10 points)

Translate to English:

  1. blanu →
  2. xekri →
  3. clani →
  4. ganra →
  5. crino →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. red →
  2. white →
  3. short →
  4. deep →
  5. yellow →
Answers
  1. blue
  2. black
  3. long
  4. wide
  5. green
  6. xunre
  7. blabi
  8. tordu
  9. condi
  10. pelxu

Part B: Tanru Formation (8 points)

Create tanru:

  1. blue car → ?
  2. big red house → ?
  3. fast run → ?
  4. good book → ?

Identify what x1 is for each tanru:

  1. blanu gerku → x1 = ?
  2. sutra klama → x1 = ?
  3. xamgu citka → x1 = ?
  4. melbi zdani → x1 = ?
Answers
  1. blanu karce
  2. barda xunre zdani
  3. sutra bajra
  4. xamgu cukta
  5. dog (from gerku)
  6. goer (from klama)
  7. eater (from citka)
  8. house (from zdani)

Part C: Sentences (7 points)

Translate:

  1. This is a black cat.
  2. I see a big white dog.
  3. Bob owns a long blue car.
  4. Alice runs fast.

Give two possible meanings:

  1. karce zdani → ?
Answers
  1. ti xekri mlatu
  2. mi viska la barda blabi gerku
  3. la .bob. cu ponse la clani blanu karce
  4. la .alis. cu sutra bajra
  5. House for cars (garage) / car-shaped house / mobile home / etc.

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Create a Description

Use at least:

  • Two colors
  • One size/dimension word
  • One quality word
  • Three tanru

Example:

mi ponse la barda blanu karce
.i la karce cu sutra
.i mi nelci la xunre cmalu zdani
.i ti melbi

(I own a big blue car. The car is fast. I like the small red house. This is beautiful.)

Create your own and say it aloud.

Summary

You completed Week 10 on tanru. You can now form two-word compounds, understand place structure inheritance, and interpret ambiguous tanru.

Next week preview: Week 11 introduces tanru grouping with bo and ke...ke'e for longer compounds.

Congratulations

do kakne lo nu zbasu lo tanru

(You are able to create tanru!)

Ten weeks complete. You've mastered basic Lojban compound words.
